where.if: AND (l.description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR l.target_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.select:
SELECT b.id, b.title, b.description, b.created_at, COUNT(l.id) as activity_count FROM board b JOIN board_member bm ON b.id = bm.board_id AND bm.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN activity_log l ON b.id = l.board_id AND l.user_id = #{userId} AND l.created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
b.deleted_at IS NULL AND bm.deleted_at IS NULL
AND b.team_id = #{teamId}
GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY activity_count DESC, b.created_at DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT l.id, l.type, l.target_name AS targetName, l.description, l.created_at AS createdAt, u.nickname AS actorName, b.title AS boardTitle, t.name AS teamName FROM activity_log l JOIN user u ON l.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN board b ON l.board_id = b.id LEFT JOIN team t ON l.team_id = t.id
ORDER BY l.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity_log (user_id, team_id, board_id, type, target_id, target_name, description, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{teamId}, #{boardId}, #{type}, #{targetId}, #{targetName}, #{description}, NOW())
